data.title: D&AD Annual 2021
data.meta_description: This yearâs D&AD Awards were analysed by 455 judges from 91 countries. Judging panels comprised leaders and practitioners across disciplines, and were drawn from design and advertising agencies, brand in-house teams, the freelance community and the production world, in order to create a global cross section of peers who represent and recognise creative excellence. Get to know them here.
